import { Outlet } from 'react-router-dom' import React from 'react' import Navbar from './Navbar' import Sidebar from './Sidebar' import Alerts from './Alerts' import { signOut } from '../../redux/actions/authActions' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' function MainLayout() { const currentUser = useSelector(state => state.auth.user) const dispath = useDispatch() const handleSignout = () => { dispath(signOut()) } return (
{/* */}
) } export default MainLayout
